name: Tribe Amsterdam City
description: Tribe Amsterdam City is located in the up-and-coming Amsterdam North. The hotel has been inspired by the designers Feix & Merlin, and is the perfect destination for fun-loving travellers who are eager to discover Amsterdam's underground cultural scene.accorhotels.com

name: Mercure Amsterdam North Station
description: The Mercure Hotel Amsterdam North Station is located in the up and coming Noord area of Amsterdam. Situated next to the Amsterdam Noord Metro Station and within five minutes metro ride you are in Amsterdam city centre. The hotel's designer Charlotte Emmerig has drawn on local wetlands to create a hotel inspired by cosy tranquillity. Enjoy access to state of the art fitness facilities, bar, restaurant and rooms fitted with all the modern comforts you'd expect from the Mercure brand.accorhotels.com

name: NH City Centre Amsterdam
description: Set in a traditional Art Deco building dating back to the 1950s, NH City Centre Amsterdam is close to all of the main attractions in Amsterdam. Walk to Singel canal, Dam Square, the Royal Palace, the Flower Market and the Anne Frank house. There are plenty of shops, bars and restaurants near the hotel as well. Central Station is only 3 tram stops away and you can reach it from Spui station. For direct access to the airport, there is a shuttle bus. The 213 rooms at NH City Centre Amsterdam enjoy a fresh and contemporary décor. Many have canal views or features such as split floors and high ceilings. For your comfort, rooms are have large comfy beds and flat-screen TVs and come equipped with free Wi-Fi and air-conditioning. Guests have access to a gym and free Wi-Fi. In the morning, guests are invited to enjoy a large and varied buffet breakfast.NH Hoteles

name: Pillows Grand Boutique Hotel Maurits at the Park - Small Luxury Hotels
description: Pillows Grand Boutique Hotel Maurits at the Park - Small Luxury Hotels is located in the Oosterpark in a former monumental university building, next to Tropenmuseum. Go on a culinary journey at VanOost Restaurant, enjoy a tasteful lunch in the lively Spring Cafe Brasserie, or start or end the night with an aperitif in Fitz’s Bar. Popular points of interest nearby include Royal Theater Carré, Dutch National Opera & Ballet and Rembrandt House. Attractions in the area include Rembrandtplein, 1.6 km away, or Flower Market, situated 1.9 km from the property. - Heineken Experience is 2 km from Pillows Grand Boutique Hotel Maurits at the Park - Small Luxury Hotels. Schiphol Airport is 12 km from the property. The hotel offers parking. The concierge can offer helpful tips for getting around the area. Extended breakfast is served every morning in Spring Café Brasserie. The rooftop bar is the perfect summer destination with a wide view over the Oosterpark. It is a lovely private space for events as well. Fitz’s on the Roof opens when it is 20 degrees celcius or more. All rooms are equipped with a hand steamer (for clothes). The maximum occupancy per room is two adults at Pillows Grand Boutique Hotel Maurits at the Park. It is possible to reserve connecting rooms. The hotel offers secured underground parking with charging points for electric vehicles.

name: Hilton Amsterdam
description: Famous for John Lennon and Yoko Ono's 1969 'bed-in for peace', the monumental Hilton Amsterdam is a short walk from the old city centre, Vondelpark, the Concert Hall, Amsterdam's world-famous Van Gogh Museum and the renowned Rijks museum. Hilton Amsterdam, with its waterside garden, is located in the striking center of 'Zuid'. Sip a cocktail in the Half Moon Lounge overlooking the marina or enjoy fine Italian dining in Roberto's Restaurant, regarded as one of the best in Holland. Only 15 minutes from Amsterdam Schiphol Airport, the hotel has a business center and 21 meeting rooms with modern equipment. Enjoy wireless internet throughout the hotel. Experience the comfort of our newly restyled rooms and suites featuring city or canal views. Relax in one of our deluxe rooms and enjoy convenience of various amenities. Choose for an Executive room to enjoy exclusive top floor access to the Executive Lounge with panoramic view of Amsterdam or treat yourself to one of our luxurious suites to enjoy more space.Hilton

name: Park Centraal Amsterdam
description: Park Centraal Amsterdam, part of Sircle Collection is set in the high-end district of Oud-Zuid right next to the Rijksmuseum, and 500 metres from the Van Gogh museum and lively Leidse Square. It features rooms with high-tech essentials, a gym, in-house parking facilities and boutiques. All rooms are elegantly decorated and have a private bathroom. Some rooms have large windows that enable a light atmosphere and provide views of the Amsterdam scenery. The award winning MOMO Restaurant, Bar & Lounge offers Pan Asian dishes with a contemporary accent and a relaxing spot to relax. MOMO combines the flavours of the Far East with the style and sophistication of the West. The centrepiece of the ground-floor lobby, Bar Claes is an elegant setting serving food and drinks, including a selection of spirits and classic cocktails with contemporary twists. Next to Park Centraal Amsterdam, part of Sircle Collection is the entrance to Amsterdam's beautiful Vondel Park. Guests can take fantastic canal walks directly from the hotel along the Singelgracht. This hotel was recently awarded with the Four Stars Superior Hotel Classification.

name: Luxury Suites Amsterdam
description: Welcome to Luxury Suites Amsterdam, one of the finest Five-star boutique hotels in Amsterdam, where you can enjoy a luxurious and tailor-made stay. Luxury Suites Amsterdam, an exclusive luxury hotel based in an excellent location, is an earthly paradise with a breath-taking lavish interior and a delightful canal view. A luxurious stay in the center of Amsterdam When in the hotel, you can enjoy a relaxing and lavish atmosphere, having drinks either at our sophisticated bar or in your suite. The size of our 25 unique-style suites ranges between 50 and 90 square meters and all of them provide the perfect amenities to guarantee a luxurious stay. You can either have a quite suite facing a traditional Dutch neighborhood or a suite with a charming canal view. In any case, our friendly and well-trained staff will make sure that you make the most of your stay in Amsterdam and Luxury Suites Amsterdam. Our experienced golden key concierge will assist you in your every step with helpful and insightful recommendations. With your stay our luxurious and complimentary transfer service from Amsterdam Schiphol Airport is included, contact us with your flight details and private transport from the airport to the hotel will be arranged.bestwestern.com

name: The Dylan Amsterdam
description: Boutique hotel The Dylan is set along the Keizersgracht canal, in the heart of Amsterdam. Dam Square is a short walk away. The on-site restaurant Vinkeles, located in an 18th century bakery, has Two Michelin stars, and there is the more casual dining establishment, Bar Brasserie OCCO, on-site as well. The Dylan offers different rooms and suites, some of them specially designed by Studio Linse and Remy Meijers, a well-known Dutch designer. All have luxurious bathrooms, a bathrobe and slippers. There is free Wi-Fi. The Dylan has a fitness centre, a massage service and a garden with terrace. There is a lounge and bar to relax. The Nine Streets shopping area can be found around the corner for guests who enjoy boutique shopping. All major sights are within walking distance. Trams, buses and metro stops are only minutes away.

name: Jan Luyken Amsterdam
address: Jan Luijkenstraat 58, 1071 CS Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Jan Luyken Amsterdam is housed in several 19th century mansions in the Museum Quarter, opposite to Rijksmuseum and Van Gogh Museum. The 4-star boutique hotel offers elegant rooms. The characteristic Amsterdam stairs lead up to the rooms which combine historic elements with modern furnishings. Guests benefit from large box-spring beds, a flat-screen TV and large windows offering views of the surroundings. Everything for a comfortable stay is included, from breakfast in the morning to home-made snacks throughout the day. Guests can also help themselves to a selection of house wine, local beers and cocktails. Leidseplein offers a wide range of trendy bars, cafes, cinemas and theatres, it is 700 metres away from Jan Luyken Amsterdam. The renowned shopping street P.C. Hooftstraat and the lively Vondel Park are just around the corner.

name: Crowne Plaza Amsterdam - South
address: George Gershwinlaan 101, 1082 MT Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Just a stroll away from the city centre. Crowne Plaza Amsterdam-South is located in the south of Amsterdam, just a five-minute walk from Amsterdam Zuid station, which connects guests to the city center within 10 minutes by metro. Art fans are just 10 minutes away from the masterpieces at the Van Gogh and Rijksmuseum. Bikes are available at the hotel to explore the city like a local. The hotel offers modern design accommodation with free Wi-Fi, fitness facilities, a business corner and a convenience store in the lobby. Every morning, a full American breakfast with live cooking is served. Visit the Manhattan Lounge Bar for a coffee, some cake and later in the day a tasty cocktail with delicious food. Lose yourself in a wonderful brewing pot of exotic aromas, bold colours and Asian hospitality at the signature restaurant Happyhappyjoyjoy Zuidas. The spacious hotel rooms offer luxurious beds, a pillow menu to guarantee a good night's sleep, a comfortable seating area, coffee and tea facilities, air-conditioning, ironing facilities and a large modern bathroom with either a bathtub or walk-in shower. Windows in each hotel room can be opened for some fresh air. Whether you are hosting a convention, a brainstorm session or after-work drinks, our centrally located venue and on-site catering will exceed your expectations. With ten flexible meeting rooms, featuring natural daylight, Crowne Plaza can seat up to 145 delegates in theater style.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: INK Hotel Amsterdam - MGallery
address: Nieuwezijds Voorburgwal 67, 1012 RE Amsterdam, North Holland
description: INK Hotel Amsterdam owes its name to the rich history of the building in which, as former home of the Dutch newspaper 'De Tijd', stories were conceived, written and brought to life in ink. INK Hotel is the place "where stories are yet to be written". INK Hotel Amsterdam is a luxury design hotel, where the traditional rules of hospitality are freely translated to the modern day, rewriting the definition of 'luxury'. Award winning, design located in the heart of Amsterdam.accorhotels.com

name: Sofitel Legend The Grand Amsterdam
address: Oudezijds Voorburgwal 197, 1012 EX Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Located between two historical canals in the heart of the city, The Grand boasts a rich history; from a 15th-century convent to royal lodgings, to the headquarters of the Admiralty to the City Hall of Amsterdam. The hotel offers five-star luxury in a unique ambiance, furnished with French elegance and grandeur. The spacious accommodations, the exceptional food and beverage proposition, the historic meeting/event venues and the indulgent Sofitel SPA captivate and seduce everyone into visiting this hotel.accorhotels.com

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Amsterdam Centraal Station
description: Set in the heart of the historic city center, DoubleTree by Hilton Amsterdam Centraal Station places business and leisure guests within reach of Amsterdam's famous shopping streets and cultural heritage sites. Guest rooms in this Amsterdam hotel boast floor-to-ceiling windows framing views of Amsterdam city center, courtyard, or IJ River. Enjoy the flat screen TV and complimentary WiFi in every room. The hotel's high vibe elevated sky bar and terrace, LuminAir, offers signature handcrafted cocktails and flavorful international bites. Designed to mirror the mood of the sky above, LuminAir's modern interiors are an ever-changing canvas of art and light, thanks to cloud-shaped installations and luminous projections. Guests can enjoy a breathtaking view of the city. See you in the clouds! Dine in Eastwood Beer & Grill and enjoy culinary dishes prepared by our chef and his team. We also provide a special kids' menu with a variety of options. Step into the DoubleTree by Hilton Amsterdam Centraal Station and begin your visit with one of our famous freshly baked DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookies.Hilton

name: Corendon Plaza Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel
description: Corendon Plaza Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel has a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Badhoevedorp. This 4-star hotel provides a spa experience, with its sauna and spa centre. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, an ATM and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Corendon Plaza Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a vegetarian or halal breakfast. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Corendon Plaza Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel. Vondelpark is 8.3 km from the hotel, while Van Gogh Museum is 9.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 3 km from Corendon Plaza Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel.

name: Steigenberger Airport Hotel Amsterdam
address: Stationsplein Zw 951, CE 1117 Schiphol, North Holland
description: This beautiful 4-star hotel with 440 luxury styled hotel rooms, is located in the non-flying zone and next to the Amsterdam Forest. The complimentary Shuttle Service brings you from-and-to Schiphol Airport in only 8 minutes. Relax (free of charge) in the Lifestyle Club & Active Spa with the most beautiful indoor heated swimming pool, steam bath, sauna, solarium, relaxation area and 24/7 fitness room. The unique Sports & Media Bar (open 7 days per week for lunch, drinks and dinner) offers a wide range of international dishes. While enjoying, you can watch sports events from all over the world displayed on large television screens. In the Trattoria (open Monday-Friday for dinner, as from 18:00 hours) you can enjoy traditional Italian dishes combined with beautiful wines. The most delicious coffees with homemade pastries will be served in our Coffee & Wine Lounge and the most luxury breakfast buffet with a wide range of fresh products will be served in our Patio Restaurant every morning. This hotel is also the perfect location for large international meetings & events. All 15 multifunctional modern conference rooms (with capacity up to 620 persons in Theatre style and all equipped with high-tech facilities) have natural daylight and are located on the ground floor. The large foyer area is accommodated with welcome desks and ideal for stands or coffee breaks.Official Hotel Information

name: Sheraton Amsterdam Airport Hotel and Conference Center
description: With its best location, directly inside Schiphol Amsterdam Airport via a covered hallway, Sheraton Amsterdam Airport Hotel ensures a smooth transition between travel, business and relaxation. Our 4-star hotel is only a short 2-minutes’ walk away from the airport’s terminals and 15 minutes away from Amsterdam City Center. The hotel is well located above the international train station connecting you to major European cities. The three in-house dining outlets make sure there is something for everyone’s taste. Enjoy a veg-forward and all-day dining menu at Commune Restaurant or choose to dine more upscale at grill restaurant Stripes. Set inside a contemporary atrium with a soaring ambience, The Gate Bar is ideal for a quick meeting, lunch or night cap. Planning a gathering? Host your next meeting or event at our conference airport hotel. We have ample parking available, hi-tech meeting spaces and superb catering, let our team help you plan your successful event.Marriott

name: Hilton Amsterdam Airport Schiphol
address: Schiphol Boulevard 701, 1118 BN Schiphol, North Holland
description: Hilton Amsterdam Airport Schiphol is unlike any other airport hotel. Visionary and inspirational, its breathtaking design redefines what an airport hotel should be. Directly connected to the international airport terminal of Amsterdam Airport Schiphol via a covered walkway, the hotel is an ideal base for guests catching a flight or visiting the cosmopolitan city of Amsterdam. The railway station inside the terminal provides easy access to the city center in just 15 minutes. The stylish guest rooms and suites boast unique diamond-shaped windows, curved walls and Dutch art. Work comfortably at the ergonomic desk, check your emails with complimentary WiFi and refresh in the spacious bathroom. Upgrade to an executive room or suite for Executive Lounge access. Fresh, bold and surprising are worthy descriptions for the modern Bowery Restaurant with three open kitchens offering Asian & Grill dishes and the stylish Axis Lobby & Cocktail Bar with a wide selection of gins and jenevers. Thrive at the 24-hour fitness center, also offering a sauna and steam room. The first and second floors of this hotel function as an extensive meeting and conference center. It offers 1800 sq. m. of naturally lit flexible event space including a grand pillar less ballroom. A 15-minute train ride takes you from the railway station at Amsterdam Airport Schiphol to the heart of Amsterdam, where you'll find famous museums like Rijksmuseum and Hermitage, great nightlife, colorful markets, lots of retail, and dining options. Take a boat tour of the city's meandering canals or visit the historic former brewery at The Heineken Experience. A little farther away, you find Zandvoort with its sandy beaches, trendy beach bars, and family activities. Or visit the Zaanse Schans, Dutch history full of windmills, handicraft shops, and museums. In Spring, the famous Keukenhof, one of the world’s largest flower gardens, is a must see.Hilton

name: Renaissance Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel
address: Meester Jacob Takkade 35, 1432 CB Aalsmeer, North Holland
description: Experience uncommon sophistication and unparalleled service at Renaissance Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel. Located at the Amsterdamse Bos, our hotel is just minutes from Schiphol Airport. Make yourself at home in our stylish and spacious guest rooms, featuring plush bedding, a flat-screen TV, a well-equipped work area and an espresso machine. Many hotel rooms offer views of the Amsterdamse Bos and the Ringvaart. Those looking to host a meeting or gathering will appreciate our five modern event rooms with cutting-edge technology. Gather with friends in our cocktail bar Xplore, and savor delicious global cuisine at Signature, our hotel restaurant. Maintain your fitness routine in our 24/7 state-of-the-art fitness centre. Enjoy easy access to Amsterdam city centre; our hotel Navigator will happily provide a list of hidden gems to explore nearby. Expect the unexpected - with distinctive style, thoughtful amenities and a touch of whimsy - at our chic modern hotel near Schiphol Airport in Amsterdam.Marriott

name: Andaz Amsterdam Prinsengracht - A Concept By Hyatt
description: Set in Amsterdam’s former public library in the heart the canal belt, lifestyle hotel Andaz Amsterdam Prinsengracht - a concept by Hyatt offers elegant design rooms with free WiFi. The Jordaan area and Museumplein are within a 15-minute walk and Negen Straatjes is just 120 metres away. The hotel's interior is designed by famous Dutch designer Marcel Wanders and the rooms and suites feature views over Amsterdam’s canals, the hotel’s landscape garden or the interior lobby. All rooms feature a seating area with flat-screen TV, a minibar with complimentary drinks and snacks and coffee/tea making facilities. The rooms feature an open bathroom concept, with closed shower and toilet, but an open vanity table. Bathrobes and free toiletries are provided. The on-site restaurant Bluespoon serves breakfast, lunch, dinner, as well as a Sunday brunch. Dishes are European with a creative twist and all ingredients are local and seasonal, often picked from the hotel’s herb and vegetable garden during the summer. There is also a bar with open bar counter, where guests can lounge with a craft cocktail and overlook the famous Prinsengracht canal. Andaz Amsterdam Prinsengracht has a Spa & Fitness centre where guests can enjoy a massage and make use of the 24-hour gym. Other facilities of the hotel include bike rental, boat tours, valet parking and a babysitting service and event spaces. The Rijksmuseum, Moco Museum and the Anne Frank House are all within 15-minute walk from the hotel. The Vondelpark is a 10-minute walk away. The Leidseplein, known for its many bars and clubs, is 400 metres from the hotel.

name: The Florian Amsterdam Airport
description: Set in Hoofddorp, 19 km from Keukenhof, The Florian Amsterdam Airport offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At The Florian Amsterdam Airport every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a vegetarian breakfast. Vondelpark is 19 km from The Florian Amsterdam Airport, while Van Gogh Museum is 20 km away. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 3 km from the hotel.

name: Mövenpick Hotel Amsterdam City Centre
address: Piet Heinkade 11, 1019 BR Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Spectacular city views and views of the IJ River are just some of the highlights at Movenpick Hotel Amsterdam City Centre, just 20 minutes from Schiphol Airport. All 408 rooms offer great views of the city of Amsterdam. Enjoy dinner in our restaurant or a nightcap in the cozy Lobby and Lounge Bar. Relax in our Lifestyle Studio with fitness room, Finnish sauna, bio sauna, ice fountain and massage room.accorhotels.com

name: Kimpton De Witt Amsterdam, An IHG Hotel
address: Nieuwezijds Voorburgwal 5, 1012 RC Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Nestled in the heart of Amsterdam’s thriving City Centre, our hotel inspires you to imagine, explore, create, and find a comfortable place to relax. We invite you to live like locals. With one foot in Amsterdam’s rich past and another in its thriving present, our exciting City Centre location celebrates Dutch culture, art, and modern urban energy. And located right next to Amsterdam Central Station. From the central Kimpton De Witt address, there’s something for everyone. For outdoor lovers, biking and walking are rites of passage. Art lovers will feast their eyes on contemporary Dutch works and famed masterpieces by native Old Masters such as Johannes Vermeer, Rembrandt van Rijn and Jan Steen. History connoisseurs will revel in the wealth of monumental landmarks like the Anne Frank House and Van Gogh Museum. Culinary and drink enthusiasts will devour craft breweries, hip cafés, amazing boutique shopping and discerning fine dining. The lively pulse of Amsterdam’s City Centre also beats inside Kimpton De Witt. Whether work or play, the hotel offers plenty of extra amenities and special perks to enhance your stay. Drop by the modern fitness center or retreat to the refined restaurant Celia Amsterdam, which celebrates modern-American cuisine, bringing a touch of Californian sunshine right to the heart of Amsterdam. Go for after dinner drinks in cocktail bar Super Lyan, an award-winning bar by Mr. Lyan. Don’t forget their nightly hosted social hours.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hampton by Hilton Amsterdam Airport Schiphol
description: Welcome to the Hampton by Hilton Amsterdam Airport Schiphol hotel. Conveniently located just five minutes from Amsterdam Airport Schiphol and 20 minutes by train to the vibrant city centre of Amsterdam. The hotel is perfect for stopovers, leisure breaks and business trips. Discover Amsterdam's famous attractions like the house of Anne Frank and the Van Gogh Museum and do not forget a visit to the canals. Enjoy fantastic shopping at one of Holland's biggest shopping centres just a 15 minute walk away. Haarlem and charming smaller Dutch Villages are also within easy reach of our hotel at Amsterdam Airport. The hotel does not have a shuttle service. However, you can travel to the hotel easily by train. From the airport, take the train to Hoofddorp station which is only 1 stop away and can be reached in 4 minutes. From Hoofddorp station, it is a 5 minute walk to the hotel. Taking a taxi is also possible, the average costs are 22 to 25 Euro. Unwind in a comfortable guest room with thoughtful amenities including a comfy bed, free WiFi and a handy lap desk. Start your day right with Hampton's free hot breakfast and enjoy a variety of snacks from our diverse evening menu. After a busy day, relax over drinks in the bar or work out in the fitness centre. Host a meeting or special celebration in a choice of versatile meeting rooms.Hilton

name: Hyatt Regency Amsterdam
description: Conveniently located in the centre of the city, this 5-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Amsterdam. Those staying at the property can also make use of complimentary wireless internet. There are a variety of facilities on offer to guests of Hyatt Regency Amsterdam, such as fitness classes, meeting rooms and a concierge. In fine weather, an outdoor terrace provides a nice spot to relax. The rooms at Hyatt Regency Amsterdam are air-conditioned and include a mini bar, a coffee maker and a private bathroom. They all offer an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and an alarm clock. Amsterdam's attractions, including Natura Artis Magistra and Oosterpark, are within easy walking distance of the hotel. The Tropenmuseum, the Hermitage Amsterdam and the Portuguese Synagogue are also found within a 20-minute walk away.Revato

name: Intercontinental Amstel Amsterdam, An IHG Hotel
address: Professor Tulpplein 1, 1018 GX Amsterdam, North Holland
description: The Amstel Hotel is a five-star hotel, characterized by a rich history of genuine hospitality and exceptional luxury. The hotel, with its unique location on the Amstel, received its first guests in 1867 and has since been known for its majestic appearance and homely warmth ever since.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Best Western Plus Amsterdam Airport Hotel
description: The Best Western Plus Amsterdam Airport Hotel is a 4 Star hotel that lives up to the Best Western standards. The hotel stands for personal atmosphere, hospitality, comfort and good facilities for an attractive price. The hotel offers 24-hour front office, comfortable hotel rooms and an à la carte restaurant. The hotel offers free use of its fitness facilities available for all hotel guests, air-conditioning and free wireless Internet in the entire hotel. This hotel is extremely suitable to stay in when you leave early from Schiphol Airport. Between 06:00 and 23:30 our shuttle bus will take you to the airport for free. During your stay in the hotel, you can make use of the free parking facilities (based on availability). Best Western Amsterdam Airport Hotel is located only four kilometers from Schiphol Airport. The airport is also easily accessible by public transport. Cities like Zaanstad, Haarlem and Leiden are well accessible. For the business traveler, the Best Western Plus Amsterdam Airport Hotel is ideally located near several business centers. The hotel offers 190 comfortable deluxe rooms and five quadruple rooms. The deluxe rooms are equipped with a television, work desk, safe, free coffee and tea making facilities and a bathroom with shower, toilet and hair dryer. The quadruple rooms are more spacious and are equipped with four single beds. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Novotel Amsterdam Schiphol Airport
description: The beautifully designed hotel gives guests the ultimate Dutch experience. You will find Dutch art, wooden bikes and typical Dutch decorative items throughout the entire hotel. The hotel has a key focus on sustainability and as a Green Key Gold certified hotel it strives to do everything it can to limit its impact on the environment. Did you know we keep over 500.000 honey bees on our roof? The hotel is the perfect location to explore Amsterdam and the region or for organizing a meeting or congress.accorhotels.com

name: nhow Amsterdam RAI
description: With a stay at nhow Amsterdam RAI in the southern part of the city, you’ll be a 3-minute walk from RAI Convention Centre and 8-minute drive from Ziggo Dome. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, full equipped gyms, and multilingual staff. This hotel has 9 meeting rooms available for eventsHotels.com

name: Hampton by Hilton Amsterdam Centre East
description: Welcome to Hampton by Hilton Amsterdam Centre East, a modern and charming hotel located close to the city center and only 22 minutes away from Schiphol Airport. There is a train stop nearby giving you easy access to Amsterdam Central Station, popular museums, sights and entertainment venues. The surrounding area Zeeburg and the man-made island Java Island are a great choice for guests interested in city walks, city trips and architecture. Settle into your comfortable guest room featuring our clean and fresh Hampton bed™, free WiFi, 40-inch TV, sofa bed, air-conditioning and double-glazed windows. Our Amsterdam hotel also includes an accessible room equipped with all the standard features plus a few amenities for your comfort and convenience. Enjoy Hampton’s included hot breakfast offering a choice of delicious hot and cold items. If you’re in a hurry, our 24/7 hub includes an array of delicious snacks and single-serve drinks to have on the go, in addition to some travel essentials. Make sure to stop by the Front Desk for some useful tips on local restaurants, attractions and events. Stay on top of work in the on-site work zone and exercise in the 24-hour fitness center with modern cardio and strength training equipment. Bike rental service and secure parking facility (fees apply) are also available at this Amsterdam hotel.Hilton

name: Hotel Jakarta Amsterdam
description: Hotel Jakarta Amsterdam is a unique sustainable hotel in Amsterdam at the IJ river, at the former location where ships left for Jakarta. Hotel Jakarta offers 200 luxurious rooms with a Indonesian influenced style. The boutique style hotel offers rooms of 30 m2 with an Indonesian twist. Most of the superior rooms feature a balcony, with panoramic views over the river IJ on one side and looking over the central station on the Waterfront side. Enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner at Café Jakarta or get a drink at sky bar Malabar on the 8th and 9th floor. A Breakfast buffet is served each morning at the property and is included in the rates. Relax in the wellness and swimming pool with views off the river IJ. The hotel is located within 1.2 km of the central station. The main shopping area is 1.5 km away, while Dam square and Royal Palace can be found at a distance of 2.1 km.

name: Moxy Amsterdam Schiphol Airport
description: Your day just got better! Welcome to Moxy Amsterdam Schiphol Airport - a stylish and playful hotel, just minutes from Amsterdam Schiphol Airport. Coming from the airport? Our shuttle bus will take you directly to Moxy from the airport! Arriving in our hotel, you will experience smart service and gorgeous industrial design complemented with creative features. Get everything you want and go easy on the pocketbook! We are coming for you with modern designed bedrooms, furiously-fast and free Wi-Fi and everything you need to shake up the local business community. Our rooms offer plush bedding, spacious walk-in showers and 55” Smart TVs. Play and let loose in our bar with local drinks and 24/7 Grab & Go food. Hang out with friends or colleagues in our library or pose for a post-gym selfie in our 24-hour fitness center. With only thirty minutes away from Amsterdam City Centre: check-in to check-out!Marriott

name: Swissôtel Amsterdam
description: SwissÃ´tel Amsterdam blends seamlessly with the historic buildings on Dam Square, but behind the 19th-century faÃ§ade, you'll find clean-lined, contemporary interiors and a warm welcome. Tied up in knots from your travels? Enjoy a soothing massage in youraccorhotels.com

name: Van der Valk Hotel Amsterdam - Amstel
address: Joan Muyskenweg 20, 1096 CJ Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Van der Valk Hotel Amsterdam - Amstel has opened its doors in October 2018. It offers 4-star accommodation in Amsterdam with fitness facilities and a spa and wellness centre. Centrally located in a prime location in the Oost district. 1.8 km from Amsterdam RAI only a 10-minute ride by metro to Amsterdam city centre. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The rooms vary from 24m2 to 55m2 and are all equipped with a flat-screen TV, a desk and air conditioning. The private bathroom features a rain shower and is fitted with free toiletries. Hotel guests can make use of the the spa and wellness centre including infra-red sauna, Turkish steam bath, wax salon, outdoor pool and Rasul bath. The massage services are available for a surcharge. A live cooking breakfast buffet is served every morning at the property. The in-house a la carte restaurant serves international cuisine. Bar Moqum is the hotel bar where you can enjoy a cup of coffee, have a cocktail and eat a curry, burger or salad. Only a 5-minute walk to the metro Overamstel, Amsterdam Arena and Ziggo Dome are 2.9 km from the accommodation. Schiphol Airport is 11 km from the property.

name: NH Amsterdam Zuid
address: Van Leijenberghlaan 221, 1082 GG Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Located in Zuidas, Amsterdam’s business district, NH Amsterdam Zuid offers a free shuttle to get to your meetings from Monday to Friday. A short drive from the hotel you will find the World Trade Center, RAI Convention Center, Amstelpark and the lively Pijp district. Guests can access the city center in 20 minutes by taking the metro or tram at the Van Boshuizenstraat station, arriving at the Amsterdam Central Station. The rooms at NH Amsterdam Zuid are decorated in a contemporary style with white décor and bright splashes of green. Rooms let in a lot of natural light and feature wooden floors. Guests staying in the Superior Rooms and Junior Suites have access to Nespresso machinestoo and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. At the cozy but contemporary Sinfonía restaurant, guests will delight in our fresh breakfast buffet. Later, they can taste delicious French and international dishes. Or, if you prefer a light snack with drinks, enjoy them on our lovely terrace. With 18 conference rooms, the hotel has the perfect meeting facilities where you can make use of the SMART Room System technology to facilitate videoconferencing. Facilities also include a gym and a spa.NH Hoteles

name: Premier Suites Plus Amsterdam
description: PREMIER SUITES PLUS Amsterdam has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Amsterdam, 2.2 km from Vondelpark, 2.7 km from Amsterdam RAI and 2.7 km from Van Gogh Museum, the Museum Square is reachable within 5 minutes by tram. Free WiFi is available and private paid parking is available on site. Each unit features a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area with a sofa, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine with dryer settings, and a private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. A microwave, a fridge and oven are also provided, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine. An external gym, TrainMore, is also available at PREMIER SUITES PLUS Amsterdam, this is inside the same property. A bicycle rental service is available at the aparthotel. Moco Museum is 2.8 km from PREMIER SUITES PLUS Amsterdam, while Heineken Experience is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 12 km from the accommodation and easily reachable by train within 6 minutes. Amsterdam South Railway Station is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Corendon Apartments Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel
description: Located within 8.4 km of Vondelpark and 9.2 km of Van Gogh Museum in Badhoevedorp, Corendon Apartments Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel provides accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and flat-screen TV. Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, private bathroom and a kitchen including a dishwasher, oven, microwave and a fridge. The aparthotel offers a vegetarian or halal breakfast. The restaurant at Corendon Apartments Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel serves international cuisine. Guests at the accommodation use the gym or relax in the spa and wellness centre including a sauna, a wellness packages and a steam room. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings and Corendon Apartments Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel can arrange a bicycle rental service. Moco Museum is 9.3 km from the aparthotel, while Leidseplein is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Schiphol, 3 km from Corendon Apartments Amsterdam Schiphol Airport Hotel, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Amsterdam City Center
description: Conveniently located, Radisson Blu Hotel Amsterdam City Center offers easy access to Amsterdam's main hot spots. It provides 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The hotel has a fitness centre with a sauna, cardiovascular equipment and a cross trainer. For a quick and effortless check-in and departure experience, guests can take advantage of the express check-in/check-out feature. Radisson Blu Hotel Amsterdam City Center features rooms equipped with converters/voltage adaptors, tea and coffee making facilities and cable/satellite channels. They feature blackout curtains, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. Radisson Blu Hotel Amsterdam City Center provides an on-site bar, De Pastorie, which serves a variety of beverages in a cosy setting. Lunch and dinner are available daily at De Palmboom. Guests are also able to try one of the many bars and restaurants in the surrounding area. The hotel is close to Nieuwmarkt Metro Station, making it easy for guests to discover Amsterdam and its surrounding areas. The local area is also well known for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: W Amsterdam
description: A stay with us is immersive. A place that embodies the city's cool, creative, cutting-edge spirit. Flowing through two unique buildings - a former telephone exchange and a bank. Life in this city with W is a bright blend of historic Dutch architecture wrapped in avant garde design. Set aside Dam Square for an unrivalled stay in the heart of Amsterdam’s vibrant energy. A highlight of luxury in our 238 stylish guest rooms, including 23 suites, 3 WOW suites, and 2 more Extreme WOW Suites. Indulge in culinary delights at our destination restaurants doubling as design favorites, THE DUCHESS and MR PORTER. Sip signature cocktails at our rooftop W Lounge, overlooking the Royal Palace and city lights, with an iconic rooftop pool, WET Deck.With our Whatever/Whenever service, W Insiders and W Happenings, you'll have exclusive access to Amsterdam's vibrant nightlife, dining, shopping and fashion scene throughout your stay. A unique blend of heritage and contemporary style awaits.Marriott

name: De L'Europe Amsterdam
address: Nieuwe Doelenstraat 2-14, 1012 CP Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Founded on the remains of a late medieval fortress, De L'Europe Amsterdam offers luxurious accommodation along the Amstel River, in the heart of the city. This 5-star hotel includes a fitness area, spa and wellness facilities and a waterside terrace. Valet parking is available at an additional charge. The guest rooms and suites blend a classic design, including a Carrara marble bathroom, with contemporary amenities such as Apple TV, A Bose surround sound system and motion detecting floor lighting. A nespresso machine and international adapters are also featured. Some rooms and suites offer a balcony overlooking the Amstel and historic centre of Amsterdam. Dutch Masters replicas are displayed in each room in partnership with the Rijksmuseum. De L’Europe includes the fine-dining restaurant Flore with 2 Michelin Stars and a Green Star and a brasserie named Marie which serves French cuisine. The iconic Freddy's Bar offers cocktails and gourmet snacks accompanied by live piano music. Both restaurants and the bar overlook the Amstel and the city centre of Amsterdam. In addition, a luxurious wellness center, Le Spa by Skins Institute compliments the hotel. Luxurious body treatments and sublime skincare are offered using only organic ingredients under the care of professional therapists. The wellness centre boasts saunas, a swimming pool and a fitness studio with 'technogym' cardiovascular and resistance equipment. Dam Square is less than a 10-minute walk away. The Flowermarket is only 200 metres away and Foam is 500 metres. The nearby Spui tram stop gives easy access to Amsterdam Central Railway Station and Museum Square.

name: The Social Hub Amsterdam City
description: The Social Hub Hotel Amsterdam City offers design accommodation within 20 minutes walking distance of the city centre. It is also a 5 minute subway ride to the city centre. Explore the city and its hotspots by foot or public transport, since Metro Station Wibautstraat is right outside the hotel. Several restaurants and clubs in the neighborhood to provide entertainment. Free WiFi is offered. Each room of The Social Hub Hotel Amsterdam City features an en suite. There is a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The gym can be used for free. Extras include communal spaces such as a library, work places and café. The vintage market at Waterlooplein in only 3 minutes away by metro and an 8 minute walk will get you to the up-and-coming Oost (east) where you will find bars and restaurants. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 20 km from The Social Hub Hotel Amsterdam City.

name: Pestana Amsterdam Riverside
description: This luxury 5-star hotel situated in a monumental building, the former Town Hall and Archive of the Amstel Community. Located near the Albert Cuypmarkt street market this hotel features a variety of facilities including a restaurant, a fully equipped fitness centre, spa and massage services. Pestana Amsterdam Riverside provides rooms with air conditioning. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All 154 luxury bedrooms and suites located in the Town Hall, Archive Building offer a flat-screen TV and coffee and tea facilities. Each building gives its own identity to the rooms and suites. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. Pestana Amsterdam also offers 16 studios equipped with a kitchenette. Some rooms offer a river view and feature a private bathroom with a bath. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed in the breakfast area. ARCHIVE by Pestana restaurant has a patio garden at the hotel. There is an in-house bar and guests can also make use of the business area including 10 meeting rooms. The wellness area in the hotel includes 2 types of saunas, an indoor swimming pool and treatment of massage can be booked for complete relaxation. Speaking Portuguese and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Parking is available on-site. Heineken Experience is a 18-minute walk from the property, while Carre Theatre is a 12-minute walk away. Hermitage Amsterdam is 1.4 km from the property while Rijksmuseum and Stedelijk museum are only 1.7 km away.

name: Doubletree By Hilton Hotel Amsterdam - Ndsm Wharf
description: Boasting a peaceful waterfront location, contemporary design, inviting guest rooms and fantastic business and leisure amenities: the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Amsterdam - NDSM Wharf hotel is the perfect base for guests who want to easily experience the cosmopolitan city of Amsterdam, but avoid the frenetic pace of the bustling city center. Feel at home in a comfortable and contemporary guest room at this Amsterdam hotel. Enjoy modern facilities and amenities including complimentary WiFi, air-conditioning, an LED TV, a powerful rain shower, and a plush bed. Upgrade to a suite for a larger room, bed and bathroom, and wonderful views of the waterfront. Energize with the latest cardio, resistance and weights equipment in the complimentary 24-hour fitness center. Relax beside the open fireplace with a bespoke cocktail or a glass of beer, and savor Dutch specialties and international favorites as you admire local artwork in Brasserie & Bar Smederij. Make updates to your presentation, or print your boarding pass in the complimentary 24-hour business center. Host a meeting, training event or celebration for up to 100 guests at this Amsterdam hotel in our bright, modern meeting room, which features state-of-the-art A/V equipment. We look forward to welcoming you at check-in with a signature, warm chocolate chip cookie.Hilton

name: NH Collection Amsterdam Barbizon Palace
address: Prins Hendrikkade 59-72, 1012 AD Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Spread over nineteen 17th century houses, NH Collection Amsterdam Barbizon Palace offers stunning architecture. Situated right in the center of Amsterdam, the Royal Palace, shops and restaurants are only steps away. For the Van Gogh Museum, take a 10-minute tram ride. It is also opposite Central Station, providing direct links to the airport and the rest of the city. With 268 rooms, NH Collection Amsterdam Barbizon Palace features classic décor. The rooms are spacious and many have a beautiful city view. Connecting rooms and apartments are available, and climate control comes as standard throughout. Luxurious breakfasts are served at Hudson’s Terrace & Restaurant, where guests can also enjoy an à-la-carte menu in the afternoon and evening. The true culinary highlight of the hotel is Restaurant Vermeer which is led by Chef de Cuisine Chris Naylor. For something special, the hotel also has a private boat dock and can organize boat tours and floating dining. There is also a bar, gym and wellness area including sauna and steambath. NH Collection Amsterdam Barbizon Palace is the perfect venue for weddings, meetings and special events. The conference center is unique, situated in St. Olaf’s 15th century chapel. There are dedicated event planners and 12 meeting rooms.NH Hoteles

name: Amsterdam Marriott Hotel
description: Experience a well-deserved escape at our hotel in Netherlands, Amsterdam. The Amsterdam Marriott Hotel is surrounded by stunning canals and exquisite architecture boasting an unparalleled city centre location across from the Leidseplein, just moments from Amsterdam's iconic attractions. Walk to the Anne Frank House, the Van Gogh Museum, Rijksmuseum and Vondelpark as well as upscale shopping, fine dining and entertainment destinations. If visiting for social events or business meetings, you'll revel in our hotel's premier facilities with 8,740 square feet of sophisticated event space. After a busy day in Amsterdam, unwind with a workout in our 24-hour fitness center or sample hand-crafted cocktails in our modern lounge. In the evening, dine on juicy steaks and fresh local produce at our delectable steakhouse before retreating to renovated accommodations with sleek bathrooms, stylish modern design and high-speed Wi-Fi. Discover unforgettable experiences at the Amsterdam Marriott Hotel.Marriott

name: ibis Schiphol Amsterdam Airport
description: ibis Schiphol Amsterdam Airport Vibrant economy hotel, open to everyone YOU are welcome! This is a 644 rooms Ibis Schiphol Amsterdam Airport hotel. The hotel offers a free shuttle service to and from Schiphol Airport. It features free fitness, a 24-hour Take Away and an extensive breakfast is served from 04:00hrs until 12:00hrs. Lunch buffet from 12:00hrs until 16:00hrs and dinner from 18:00hrs until 22:00hrs. Our Burger Bar is open from 16:00hrs until 23:00hrs for burgers and drinks. Our Bar opens at 17:accorhotels.com

name: Mercure Hotel Amsterdam Sloterdijk Station
description: You will quickly feel at home in Mercure Amsterdam Sloterdijk Station. This hotel is situated next to Station Amsterdam Sloterdijk with direct train, bus, tram and metro connections to Amsterdam city centre, Schiphol Airport and RAI congress centre. From the airport, you can be at the hotel lobby in 15 minutes. Amsterdam's city centre is just 5 minutes journey. A10 and A5 highways are close to the hotel. The hotel has a secured parking facility and the Skybar on the 8th floor offers magnificent view.accorhotels.com

name: Art'otel Amsterdam
address: Prins Hendrikkade 33, 1012 TM Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Located in the heart of Amsterdam opposite central station and within walking distance of Amsterdam's main attractions, local museums and shopping areas. The hotel's modern rooms all feature artwork by Atelier Van Lieshout and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Each room comes with mood lighting and flat-screen TV. The bathroom boasts a rain shower, separate toilet, and Elemis guest amenities. Hairdryer, luxurious bathrobes and slippers are provided. There is a mini fridge and an illy espresso machine in each room. Guests can enjoy a classic breakfast buffet in the restaurant with a few new additions from ARCA restaurant & bar with Portuguese influences. ARCA Restaurant & Bar is the perfect spot for a memorable dining experience offering modern Portuguese dishes with unique Asian influences, impressive cocktails and lively weekend nights. Amsterdam’s well-known canals are a few minutes away from this hotel and many attractions such as the Anne Frank House, Jordaan, Negen Straatjes and Dam Square with its Royal Palace are all within walking distance. Rijksmuseum and the Leidesplein and Rembrandtplein areas are easily accessible by tram.

name: Bastion Hotel Schiphol Hoofddorp
description: Bastion Hotel Schiphol Hoofddorp is located near the A4, a 20-minute drive from Schiphol Airport and offers free airport shuttle service. Bastion Hotel Schiphol Hoofddorp offers a 24-hour front office, comfortable rooms and an extensive choice of dishes from the à la carte menu in the atmospheric restaurant. Guests are always welcome in the cosy hotel bar or lounge. The lounge features LCD TV and relaxing lounge chairs. The hotel also offers free Wi-Fi in the entire hotel. In the lobby, there is a computer with internet access, at the guests disposal free of charge. Free parking is available during your stay.

name: Hotel Notting Hill
description: Boutique Hotel Notting Hill offers elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi, a restaurant and a cosy bar. This hotel is 650 metres from the Heineken Experience. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Notting Hill have boutique-style décor. They include tea and coffee making facilities. Each of the modern bathrooms is supplied with a robe and slippers. The Souterrain rooms are located below street level and therefore have limited views. A direct tram service to Amsterdam Central Station is available from Stadhouderskade tram stop, in front of the hotel. Notting Hill is a 5-minute walk from the Albert Cuyp Market in the famous Pijp district.

name: NH Amsterdam Museum Quarter
description: Housed in the Museum Quarter, NH Amsterdam Museum Quarter is only a 7-minute walk to the Rijksmuseum, the Van Gogh Museum and the Heineken Brewery. Walking a little further, guests will find the Leidse square and the RAI Exhibition and Convention Center. For Amsterdam Central Station and other points of interest, catch a tram at the Ruysdaelkade stop very close to the hotel. Offering a peaceful and quiet location, NH Amsterdam Museum Quarter has 163 spacious rooms and a lovely outlook over Amsterdam’s traditional architecture. Superior rooms offer canal views and rooms located on higher floors have floor-to-ceiling windows for the ultimate outlook over the city. Decorated with rich reds and oranges and featuring oak furnishings, every room is equipped with a mini-bar, flat-screen TV, air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Some rooms are perfect for families, featuring sofa beds. The hotel offers many spaces for guests to relax, unwind and enjoy delectable cuisine, including the Palette Restaurant, Bar and Lounge or the courtyard terrace. The lounge offers beautiful views with floor-to-ceiling windows. A varied buffet breakfast is served daily. Guests also have access to a 24-hour gym and may use the available boardroom.NH Hoteles

name: Courtyard by Marriott Amsterdam Airport
description: Find rest and productivity at Courtyard Amsterdam Airport. Conveniently located in Hoofddorp just minutes from Amsterdam Schiphol Airport, our hotel offers excellent amenities and comfortable accommodation for business and leisure travellers alike. Arrive at our AMS hotel with ease, thanks to our shuttle service to and from the Schiphol Airport. Our on-site restaurant, Brasserie Courtyard, serves hot breakfast options, craft cocktails and an all-day dining menu. Business travellers in Amsterdam love our hotel's event facilities, featuring 10 flexible function rooms, as well as unbeatable access to other business and corporate centres in Hoofddorp, AMS. At the end of a productive day, settle into one of our sleek hotel rooms or suites, boasting plush bedding, ample natural light, modern décor and premium entertainment options, including flat-screen TVs with Chromecast. Whether you are visiting for business or pleasure, Courtyard Amsterdam Airport offers all you need to maximize your stay.Marriott

name: Renaissance Amsterdam Hotel
description: Expect comfort and thoughtful convenience at Renaissance Amsterdam Hotel in the Netherlands. Ideally-located in the heart of central Amsterdam, our hotel offers easy access to celebrated historic landmarks, cultural treasures and modern entertainment. We are located only minutes away from the Amsterdam Centraal Station, the iconic Dam Square and Madame Tussauds. Retreat to spacious and comfortable hotel accommodations with signature bedding, ergonomic workspaces, high-speed Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. If planning events, take advantage of our historic 17th-century domed Koepelkerk building adjoining our hotel. We look forward to providing you with an unforgettable experience at the Renaissance Amsterdam Hotel.Marriott

name: Sir Albert Hotel, part of Sircle Collection
address: Albert Cuypstraat 2-6, 1072 CT Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Sir Albert is located only 600 metres from Museum Square and Rijksmuseum in Amsterdam. Leidse Square and the famous canal district are a 15-minute walk. This former diamond factory offers elegantly designed rooms with a view in De Pijp district, the Latin Quarter of Amsterdam. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. The interior of each elegantly designed room is inspired by various art movements from the past. Created by international award-winning designers from BK Architecture, the rooms have an Illy coffee machine, LED satellite TV, hairdryer and complimentary luxurious toiletries. Guests can have dinner at restaurant IZAKAYA, Asian Kitchen & Bar. Here guests can enjoy Japanese robata grill dishes while watching the chefs work. They can also relax with a drink at the bar or take a seat on on IZAKAYA's private terrace among Amsterdam locals. Facilities of the hotel include a study with a fireplace and library and valet parking. On-site bicycle rental is also available. The Vondelpark and the Leidseplein entertainment area offer an amusing stroll. For high-end shopping, guests can go to P.C. Hooftstraat, 1 km away. Tram 24 stops 300 metres from the hotel and links to all major tourist sights and Amsterdam Central Station.

name: Chasse Hotel
description: Chassé Hotel is set in a former church in Amsterdam-West, 1.3 km from Vondelpark and 1.4 km from Studio Westerpark. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain rooms include a seating area where you can relax. You will find a kettle in the room. Every room has a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find a hairdryer. Chasse Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire. Public transport is near the property and is located at the end of the street. Amsterdam city centre is 2.2 km and Vondelpark Open Air Theatre is 1.4 km from Chasse Hotel, while Anne Frank House is 1.6 km away. Schiphol Airport is 10 km from the property.

name: Element Amsterdam
address: A.J. Ernststraat 577, 1082 LD Amsterdam, North Holland
description: The Element Amsterdam offers 160 suites with either a Studio or One Bedroom layout designed for extended stays with room to stretch out. Enjoy the comforts of home including a kitchenette and large flat screen TV. Our upscale experience starts in our cozy lobby and common areas to our restaurant. Start each day with a complimentary breakfast and then explore Amsterdam on one of our rental bikes. Located in the south of Amsterdam close to the Zuidas Business District, the RAI Convention Centre and within walking distance to all major transportation options. Schiphol Airport is 7 minutes by train and the City Centre is 15 minutes by Metro. We are adjacent to the Gelderlandplein Mall featuring luxury shopping venues plus 3 grocery store options. You will have plenty of eating options from preparing a meal in your room, to joining restaurants in the local area.Marriott

name: Hyatt Place Amsterdam Airport
description: Hyatt Place Amsterdam Airport provides 4-star accommodation in Hoofddorp, just minutes from Amsterdam Airport Schiphol. The numerous amenities this stylish hotel has to offer include a 24-hour reception, meeting rooms and babysitting/child services. Hyatt Place Amsterdam Airport treats guests to a range of leisure facilities, such as bicycle rental and Stay Fit Fitness Center. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. Hyatt Place Amsterdam Airport has 330 rooms, all of which are filled with a range of amenities to ensure a comfortable stay. The hotel features both a restaurant and a lounge bar where guests can unwind at the end of the day with dinner and a drink. Each evening, guests are invited to enjoy a drink in the cosy lounge bar. Hyatt Place Amsterdam Airport is within walking distance of Hoofddorp Railway Station, connecting guests with the surrounding area. Amsterdam and Haarlem are located a short drive from the property.Revato

name: ibis Styles Amsterdam Airport
address: Piet Guilonardweg 3, 1117 EE Schiphol, North Holland
description: Green, Connecting and Conscious. ibis Styles Amsterdam Airport is a contemporary and stylish hotel located near Amsterdam Schiphol Airport and only a short distance away from the vibrant city center of Amsterdam. Due to its central location and its complimentary Airport Shuttle, the hotel is perfect for all kinds of travel. Besides all the hustle and bustle you will find the Amsterdam Forest, Amsterdam's largest park and recreational area, just around the corner. Be amazed by the Green Oasis!accorhotels.com

name: Bastion Hotel Amsterdam Amstel
address: Verlengde van Marwijk Kooystraat 30, 1096 BX Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Bastion Hotel Amsterdam Amstel is just 700m from Amstel Business Park and just over 7km from the city centre. It offers free Wi-Fi and free private parking based on availability. It is also a 15 minutes’ drive to Schiphol Airport. Bastion Hotel Amsterdam Amstel has rooms with free tea/coffee making facilities and a minibar. All rooms include a work desk, a safe and an alarm clock. Various grill specialities are offered for lunch and dinner. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or relax in the lounge with comfortable chairs and a flat-screen TV. Bastion Hotel Amsterdam Amstel is a 20-minute walk from Overamstel Metro Station. From here, you can reach Amsterdam Central Station in 20 minutes and the RAI Exhibition Centre in 5 minutes. It is also around 500m from the A10 Ring Road.

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Amsterdam Houthavens
description: Welcome to Residence Inn Amsterdam Houthavens, your fully equipped dream apartment. Chic interiors are inspired by Vermeer’s palettes and complimented by striking views over Houthavens harbor. The hotel offers spacious studios and suites that allow you to live as you would at home. Luxurious amenities include fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, cooktop stove, microwave and all plates and utensils. Complimentary continental buffet breakfast with hot items is served daily. The hotel also has an extensive meeting and events spaces, swimming pool and sauna, complimentary Wi-Fi throughout, communal guest lounges and laundry, and 24/7 fitness center and Grab ’n Go Market. We are located in the heart of Amsterdam's design district and connected to Moxy Amsterdam to offer access to a lively bar and outdoor terraces when weather permits.Marriott

name: Waldorf Astoria Amsterdam
description: Waldorf Astoria Amsterdam is situated along the picturesque Herengracht canal, spanning six 17th and 18th century canal palaces. Located in the in the UNESCO-listed city center, experience our Sincerely Elegant Service to make your stay truly unforgettable. Pamper yourself with personalized treatments at our Guerlain Spa or indulge in all-day dining at Peacock Alley, featuring its renowned Afternoon Tea. For an exceptional culinary experience, savor the exquisite dishes of Two-Michelin-starred restaurant Spectrum. Unwind at our Vault Bar, where expertly crafted cocktails and a cozy ambiance awaits you. For any occasion, our exquisite venues and exceptional service are at your disposal to host a tailored event that exceeds expectations.Hilton

name: Van der Valk Hotel Amsterdam Zuidas
address: Tommaso Albinonistraat 200, 1083 HM Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Van der Valk Hotel Amsterdam Zuidas -Rai has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and spa and wellness centre in Amsterdam. The property is set 280 metres from Amsterdam RAI, 3.8 km from Van Gogh Museum and 3.8 km from Moco Museum. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the hotel. At Van der Valk Hotel Amsterdam Zuidas -Rai guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna. Rijksmuseum is 3.9 km from the accommodation, while Vondelpark is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 13 km from Van der Valk Hotel Amsterdam Zuidas -Rai.

name: Apollo Hotel Amsterdam, A Tribute Portfolio Hotel
description: Set on scenic Apollolaan, overlooking the intersection of 5 canals, Apollo Hotel Amsterdam, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel welcomes guests with unique interior design, thoughtful amenities and a prime city center location. Our business hotel is within walking distance to museums, business districts, parks, the Convention Center. It's also near the Anne Frank House, The Rijksmuseum and Dam Square. Recharge in unique hotel rooms and suites which offer canal views, indulgent bedding, TVs, large workstations and free Wi-Fi. Enjoy the beauty of the Design Room and the generous living room of our suites. Indulge in fine French cuisine at The Living Room by Bodon and international favorites at The Harbour Club Amsterdam Zuid. The property also features a 24-hour fitness center, EV charging stations and a business center. For those planning events, our downtown hotel offers 5 elevated venues, including a rooftop terrace & striking ballroom, all supported by expert catering.Marriott

name: NH Collection Amsterdam Flower Market
description: Right in the city center, NH Collection Amsterdam Flower Market, formerly known as NH Carlton Amsterdam, is within a short walk to Amsterdam’s main attractions. It overlooks the famous floating Flower Market and is steps away from the Kalverstraat shopping area. You will find Rembrandt Square and other major sites within walking distance as well. Take the tram at Rembrandtplein or Rokin to Amsterdam Centraal train station, giving you easy access to the rest of the city. NH Collection Amsterdam Flower Market is set in a traditional Amsterdam building, originally constructed in 1926 for the Olympic Games. The rooms at the hotel are spacious and finished with traditional décor. Each one is soundproof and features new mattresses and hairdryers, satellite TVs and free Wi-Fi. Rooms on the top 3 floors have balconies and overlook the lively Munt Square and Munttoren (Mint Tower). Some connecting rooms are available. A freshly prepared breakfast spread is served daily, including fresh juices and coffees, and Ter Marsch & Co Amsterdam on the ground floor serve burgers daily from 11.00 am. There's also a gym onsite to help you stay in shape. NH Hoteles

name: Van Der Valk Hotel Oostzaan - Amsterdam
description: Situated in Oostzaan, 10 km from Amsterdam, the new Van der Valk Hotel Oostzaan - Amsterdam offers free private parking and free WiFi. There is a casino on site as well as an à la carte restaurant. Guests can take a refreshing plunge in the heated indoor pool on the 6th floor, where a sauna with panoramic views and a gym are also featured. The hotel boasts air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. All rooms have a walk-in rain shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer. Superior rooms boast a bubble bath. Each room comes with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and bike rental is available. Enjoy a drink at the hotel bar or relax in the wellness area. Guests can enjoy live cooking on Saturdays and a brunch on Sunday. Zaanse Schans is 10 km away, while Haarlem is 17 km from the property. Amsterdam Central Station is 10.8 km from the accommodation. Dam Square is 12 km km away. Schiphol Airport is 15 km away.

name: Hampton by Hilton Amsterdam / Arena Boulevard
description: Set in the heart of Amsterdam's vibrant entertainment district, just next to the Johan Cruijff ArenA, Hampton by Hilton Amsterdam Arena Boulevard hotel is situated a short walk to Ziggo Dome, AFAS live and many shops, restaurants, and bars. Amsterdam Schiphol Airport is easy to reach by train in just 10 minutes, and the train station is opposite the hotel. Enjoy easy access to the many famous historical sights Amsterdam has to offer, including the famous canals, the Anne Frank House or the Rijksmuseum. Feel at home in your comfortable guest room or suite where you can stay connected with free WiFi at the spacious work desk with ergonomic chair or watch a movie on the 26-inch flat screen TV as you relax on the comfy bed. Host an event at this Amsterdam hotel in our modern Board Room and stay connected with our free business center, offering a range of useful services and amenities. Energize with a morning workout in the free fitness center before enjoying Hampton's free hot breakfast buffet. There's a friendly face and free tea and coffee available in the welcoming lobby, 24-hours a day. If you need some advice on what to see or do while you're in Amsterdam, our team is available for you.Hilton

name: Monet Garden Hotel Amsterdam
description: Monet Garden Hotel Amsterdam is a boutique hotel and offers modern accommodation in Amsterdam, located next to the canals. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. Most rooms have canal views and garden views. Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso coffee machine. Each room includes a private bathroom equipped with a walk-in rain shower. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and slippers. An extensive breakfast is offered, with fresh baked waffels. Guests can make use of a 24-hour front desk and free fitness centre. After a long day, guests can relax by the fire place or enjoy local beers and Dutch gin tonic at the bar. Other facilities include a meeting room. Rembrandtplein is 800 metres from Monet Garden Hotel Amsterdam, while Carre Theatre is 900 metres from the property. The hotel is located 400 metres from Dutch National Opera & Ballet,The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 12 km from Monet Garden Hotel Amsterdam.

name: Bilderberg Garden Hotel
description: The Bilderberg Garden hotel is a 5-star hotel in a quiet area of Amsterdam, within 1,500 metres from Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum and Stedelijk Museum. Vondelpark is a 10-minute walk. It boasts an elegant restaurant, lounge with a fireplace and a terrace. Bilderberg Garden Hotel benefits from air-conditioned rooms with a work desk, tray with tea and coffee making facilities and a modern bathroom which is supplied with a robe and slippers. De Kersentuin serves French cuisine which are complimented by an extensive selection of wine. The cosy hotel bar serves light snacks and drinks including cocktails. The P.C. Hooftstraat shopping area is just over a 15-minute walk away. Bilderberg Garden is only 2 km from Amsterdam RAI. Museumplein, featuring the Rijksmuseum and Van Gogh Museum, is 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

name: Zoku Amsterdam
description: Located within 1.7 km of Amsterdam Central Station, Zoku Amsterdam is designed for professionals, business travelers and remote workers who are on the lookout for a high-design and sustainable apartment hotel for 1 day, to 1 month to 1 year. Zoku Amsterdam features 133 Lofts: private apartment-style rooms that contain a lofted bed, living room, kitchen, bathroom and large 4-person table. The award-winning Zoku Loft is a spacious micro-apartment equally suited for living and working. It is designed for inviting friends and colleagues into your home, working across multiple time zones or getting any job done while exploring the city. Each Loft sleeps two, except the Loft XXL that sleeps 4, and comes equipped with air conditioning, flat-screen TV and free high-speed Wi-Fi (60 mbps). You can even personalize your space by choosing your favorite artwork to hang on the walls for inspiration during your stay. When you feel like leaving your private room to socialize, our rooftop Social Spaces on the 6th floor feature the Living Room, Kindred Spirits Bar, Living Kitchen restaurant, Coworking Spaces, Meeting Rooms, Event Space, and a spacious terrace to cater to all the fun and practical needs of Zoku's international mix of residents. The windows throughout the rooftop offer plenty of natural daylight, giving you a much-needed break from the hustle and bustle of the city and a one-of-a-kind view of the iconic Skinny Bridge. The shared spaces are accessible 24/7, with an on-site team of ‘Sidekicks’ to support you during your stay. Amsterdam Central Station is 2 metro stops away and there is a direct metro connection to the most important business districts and historical sites. The Rembrandtplein is 700 m from Zoku. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 12 km from the property. We also offer bike rental so you can explore the city on your own terms.

name: Postillion Hotel Amsterdam
address: Paul Van Vlissingenstraat 9-11, 1096 BK Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Postillion Hotel Amsterdam is a smart hotel located in Amsterdam. It features a fitness centre, a restaurant and business facilities. 2.3 km away from Amsterdam RAI, 2.5 km from Amsterdam Arena and 3.3 km from Heineken Experience. Some rooms are fully voice controlled, others are smart controlled by a tablet. The tablet also has AirPlay connection. It includes a private bathroom featuring a mirror with integrated TV, a shower and free toiletries. The units include a desk and some units also feature a seating area. International dishes and barbecue dishes can be enjoyed at the property. Guests can also enjoy a meal for lunch and dinner, at the in-house restaurant. The convention centre includes 14 flexible meeting rooms. Postillion Hotel Amsterdam offers a terrace. Cycling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near the accommodation and bike hire is available at the property. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English and Dutch. Metro station Overamstel is only a 3-minute walk away from the property and can take you within 12 minutes to Amsterdam Central Station. Carre Theatre is 3.4 km from Postillion Hotel Amsterdam. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 11 km from the property. An underground parking with 89 parking spots is available on site.

name: Corendon Amsterdam New-West, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
address: Aletta Jacobslaan 7, 1066 BP Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Located in one of the emerging, colorful districts of the city, Corendon Amsterdam New-West is the hotspot of the local social scene, where the cultural richness and diversity of the neighborhood is celebrated in style, and everyone feels welcome. With its own parking space and conveniently close to city center, our hotel is steps away from tram line 2 passing through the landmarks such as Vondel Park, Concert Building, Museum Square, Dam Square and Central Station as well as the metro lines bringing you to RAI Convention Center and giving connections to Schiphol Amsterdam Airport. Whether you are travelling for business, visiting Amsterdam, or enjoying a weekend getaway, our 263-rooms stylish hotel is the perfect base for you. Serving a menu inspired by Caribbean and South American cuisine, our restaurant, Mondi New-West promises an eclectic and refreshing dining experience. Our Vitality Spa & Fitness spreading over 1000 m2 offers a luxurious wellness experience along with a gym open around the clock.Marriott

name: Moxy Amsterdam Houthavens
description: Hey Gorgeous, welcome to Moxy Amsterdam. Our hotel is a stylish oasis in Houthavens, Amsterdam’s oldest working harbor. It is a perfect place to relax, socialize or run your empire, with easy access to the city centre. Check-in is at the bar where we serve food and drinks 24/7. With epic views, our 19 sqm cozy rooms are modern and smart designed with an industrial vibe. The best selfies guaranteed from our floor-to-ceiling windows (natural lighting always best), there are spacious walk-in showers, furiously-fast & free Wi-Fi, and 43” Smart TVs with Chromecast. Moxy offers everything you want and nothing you don’t. You will love our neighborhood. There are ships of all sorts, superb waterfront strolls, great restaurants, and a community of creatives and designers on our doorstep. The city centre is a short bike-ride or bus ride away when you fancy the big-ticket Amsterdam experience.Marriott

name: Hotel & Wellness Zuiver
description: Enjoy a healthy and relaxing stay at this luxurious hotel in Amsterdam. Hotel & Wellness Zuiver provides a convenient base for walking and cycling in the Amsterdamse Bos. The property offers a spa and wellness centre for guests' comfort. With both modern guest rooms and luxurious suites, you can choose suitable accommodation for your trip. Weather permitting you can sit out on the terrace with a drink from the bar and enjoy the sun. The property has arranged Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday as swimwear day and wearing swimwear is mandatory. On all other days, it is not permitted to wear swimwear. With a 24-hour front desk, Hotel & Wellness Zuiver enables you to come and go as you please. Make use of the good public transport links into the city centre or take a 10-minute bicycle ride to explore Amsterdam.

name: The Student Hotel Amsterdam West
address: Van de Sande Bakhuijzenstraat 4, 1061 AZ Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Situated only a 10-minute bike ride from the city centre, The Social Hub Amsterdam West offers fully furnished rooms with free Wi-Fi. Metro station Jan van Galenstraat is only 100 metres away with direct links to RAI, Zuid WTC and Bijlmer Arena. Each room at The Social Hub Amsterdam West features an en suite bathroom with a shower or a bath and a toilet. There is a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Tram stop is a 2-minute walk away and offers direct links to Dam Square in 20 minutes and Central Station in 25 minutes. Schiphol Airport is 14 km away. Guests can go relax in the Rembrandtpark, 15 minutes by foot.

name: Boutique Apartments Amsterdam
description: Boutique Apartments Amsterdam has a fitness room and air-conditioned guest accommodation in Amsterdam, 4.9 km from Anne Frank House, 5.4 km from Royal Palace Amsterdam and 5.5 km from Amsterdam Central Station. Complimentary WiFi is featured and private parking is available on site. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, dressing room and a seating area with a sofa. A microwave, a fridge and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy an American breakfast. Leidseplein is 5.6 km from Boutique Apartments Amsterdam, while Van Gogh Museum is 5.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Canal House
description: Canal House offers boutique-style rooms in the Grachtengordel-West district, 270 metres from Westermarkt tram stop. This hotel offers free Wi-Fi. The rooms at Canal House feature sumptuous décor with dark woods and luxurious fabrics. Each room has an open-plan layout and includes a flat-screen TV and work desk. Many high-end shops such as Marcel Wanders, Bijenkorf, Puccini Chocolatier and United Nude are within walking distance from the property. The Amsterdam Tulip Museum and Anne Frank House are less than a 5-minute walk from Canal House. Amsterdam Central Railway Station is less than a 15-minute walk away.

name: The Social Hub Amsterdam West 4
address: Jan Van Galenstraat 335, 1061 AZ Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Situated in Amsterdam, 3.8 km from Anne Frank House, The Social Hub Amsterdam West 4 star features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Rooms include a coffee machine, while certain rooms have a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. At The Social Hub Amsterdam West 4 star the rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. The Social Hub Amsterdam West 4 star offers a sun terrace. You can play billiards and table tennis at the hotel, and bike hire is available. Leidseplein is 4.3 km from The Social Hub Amsterdam West 4 star, while Royal Palace Amsterdam is 4.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Cityden Bolo District
address: Bos en Lommerplantsoen 45a, 1055 AA Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Please note that all rooms/apartments have an open floor plan, no doors and climate control. With garden views, Cityden BoLo District offers aparthotel accommodation in the district of Bos & Lommer in Amsterdam. The property has a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, bar, garden and terrace. All of the spacious apartments are fully equipped with a kitchen, air conditioning, dishwasher, microwave, kettle, shower, hairdryer, wardrobe, private bathroom and seating area.
