Lucia's restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, dinner and drinks. The aparthotel also features a fully equipped gym, garden views, a terrace, parking spaces and a 24-hour front desk. Van Gogh Museum is 4.1 km from Cityden BoLo Ditstrict, while Anne Frank house is 3.5 km and the Royal Palace Amsterdam is 3.9 km away from the property. The nearest airport is Schiphol Airport, 15 km from Cityden BoLo District.

name: Adagio Amsterdam City South
address: Professor J.H. Bavincklaan 5, 1183 AT Amstelveen, North Holland
description: The hotel offers spacious, modern and air-conditioned studios and apartments, 24-hour reception and free WIFI in all areas. All studios and apartments at this aparthotel come with a smart TV and a fully equipped kitchen with a stove, microwave, fridge and dishwasher. Thanks to the location, the tram is only 450m from the hotel where you can easily connect to the Zuidas Business District and the center of Amsterdam. The hotel offers paid private parking.accorhotels.com

name: Courtyard by Marriott Amsterdam Arena Atlas
description: At the Courtyard Amsterdam Arena Atlas our fun, energetic and passionate associates help our guests Make Room For A Little Fun. Our lobby is flooded with natural light, and the impressive wooden staircase in the middle makes it a prime place to meet and greet. The rooms are designed with comfort and convenience in mind, making them utterly suitable for the modern traveler. Unwind, relax, or catch up on business while using our complimentary Wi-Fi. Enjoy the flavor of Italy in our Ristorante 51 – Your Italian Kitchen. It's your natural living room in the neighborhood, complete with an outdoor terrace! Amsterdam-Zuidoost is the heart of the business district in the capital of the Netherlands, just a short distance away from the vibrant center of Amsterdam. The hotel has convenient access to the Ziggo Dome, Johan Cruijff ArenA, AFAS Live, RAI convention centre and Schiphol Airport.Marriott

name: Holiday Inn Amsterdam - Arena Towers
description: Four-star Holiday Inn Amsterdam Arena Towers is located in the bustling Amsterdam Southeast. Go bird watching at the Ouderkerkerplas or go to the Gaasperplas Park, a recreation and nature area on the Floriade terrain from 1982. In this park, you will find a water playground and various barbecue areas. The park is ideal for walking, cycling, horse riding, water sports and kite flying. Reach the bustling centre of Amsterdam within 15 minutes by metro. Take a cruise through the historic canals, visit the Rijksmuseum and Madame Tussauds, spot animals in Artis or visit the very first WONDR Experience Museum in the Netherlands. The modern hotel is fully equipped for a pleasant stay. Think of a well-equipped room with amenities such as free coffee and tea-making facilities, a bathroom with a walk-in shower and toiletries, an LCD TV with international channels, and depending on your choice, a double bed or two single beds. A Starbucks To-Go Coffee Bar is located on the ground floor. Maintaining a sports routine? Our gym is open 24 hours a day. If you come to the hotel by car, you can use the parking lot at the hotel.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Mercure Hotel Amsterdam West
address: Oude Haagseweg 20, 1066 BW Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Your Mercure hotel close to Schiphol Amsterdam Airport. The comfortable 4-star Mercure Amsterdam West has easy access and is ideal for business and weekend getaways with a small beach only 200 meters from the hotel. Enjoy a delicious breakfast buffet, lunch or dinner in our restaurant or unwind at our hotel bar. The reception is at your service 24 hours. All rooms are equipped with a comfortable bed, work desk, TV, safe, air-conditioning & free WiFi. For your meetings, 14 meeting rooms are available.accorhotels.com

name: Jaz in the City Amsterdam
address: De Passage 90, 1101 AX Amsterdam, North Holland
description: Jaz in the City Amsterdam offers accommodation in the Zuidoost district of Amsterdam. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property. Each spacious room includes a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Jaz in the City Amsterdam offers 24-hour front desk service. Event venue Ziggo Dome and the Amsterdam Arena are in the property's direct vicinity. Amsterdam RAI Convention centre is at 5 km distance, while Schiphol Airport is 12 km away. Public transport will take guests to the city centre within 15 minutes.

name: Amsterdam Id Aparthotel
description: Convenienty situated 200 metres from Amsterdam Sloterdijk Station, Amsterdam ID Aparthotel offers spacious and modern accommodation with free WiFi. Guests can enjoy a drink in the bar or on the terrace. Amsterdam’s historic city centre is a 6-minute train ride away. All non-smoking apartments are bright and feature a modern décor with authentic Dutch elements. The apartments at this cash-free property come with a fully equipped kitchen, design furniture and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a shower. Due to our environmental footprint, our air conditioning works on climate control. Guests are free to use shared facilities such as the lounge area, fitness and a sauna. Other facilities like a bar, secured parking and laundry facilities are offered. Guests can enjoy breakfast, lunch and dinner at Adams ID, the hotel's restaurant. Also available is the playroom with a foosball table, a pool table and a dartboard. Meeting spaces for 8 up to 150 people are also available. Westergasfabriek is 2,7 km from this property. From Amsterdam ID Aparthotel, Schiphol airport and the RAI convention centre are 15 minutes away by train.
